The LOOT EOD will work in any private space, UNLESS the space comes with a video screen you cannot turn off.

This bundle includes * The Nightclub Apartment * The Nightclub Clubhouse * The Nightclub Confetti Cannon * The Nightclub Laser Display * The Nightclub Bubble Machine * BoxBeats Nightclub Edition * BoxBeats Minis Nightclub Edition * The Nightclub Lounge Seat * GST- The Nightclub Flow Dance Pack (Male) * GST- The Nightclub Flow Dance Pack (Female) * GST- The Nightclub Booty Shake Dance Pack (Male) * GST- The Nightclub Booty Shake Dance Pack (Female) Please note, in order to access this Clubhouse you will need to have purchased the Clubhouse slot from either the Estates Store or the Clubs menu (available in Options). Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time. Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories.

name: SeaClyff Day and Night Bundle
desc: You save big by getting the day and night versions of both the Retreat and the Clubhouse for one price. * SeaClyff Retreat * SeaClyff Clubhouse * Pulp Music Radio * SeaClyff Night Retreat * SeaClyff Night Clubhouse * Vintage Jazz Radio

name: 921 Acacia Drive Interior Decorator Bundle - Vivid
desc: 921 Acacia Drive Interior Decorator Bundle - Vivid This pack includes the following 921 Acacia Drive Cucumber Country Kitchen Set - Liquorice Cucumber Modern Lines Bathroom Set - Dazzle Bayonne Furniture Pack - Brights Cucumber Contemporary Bedroom Set - Vivid Live the suburban dream at 921 Acacia Drive. With a range of spacious rooms and 22 bundled furniture items, along with 8 daily reward items that give you the essential furniture items, you can decorate your home to suit your style.

desc: Take a chance and add some unique European flavor to your style. This one of a kind bundle includes the Paris Clock Tower apartment, 76 furniture items and 35 clothing items.

name: Snow Valley Personal Garden & Snow Garden Furniture Set
desc: It Is A Personal Garden In The Snow Valley Region. The Snowy Landscape All Around And The Huge Waterwheel That Pumps Up The Hot Spring Water Are Truly Spectacular. The Wind Blowing In The Valley Waves Red Kites And Flags, And Peaceful Background Music Plays In This Garden For Relaxation. The Spacious Garden Also Features A Gentle Slope And The snowman And kamakura Included In The Set, Offering A Different Kind Of Winter Gardening Experience. This Set Includes The Following Items Snow Valley Personal Garden (personal Space) Silk Hat Snowman Large (furniture) Silk Hat Snowman Small (furniture) Knitted Snowman Large (furniture) Knitted Snowman Small (furniture) Kamakura (furniture) When Purchased, Each Item Will Be Added To The Appropriate Category In The Customize Private Lounge The Image Above Is An Example Of Gardening.
